resources.string: A new time-lapse setting has been added.
Driving time-lapse, creepy crawlies, surfer on a wave, any sports
fast moving clouds, crowds of people, rush hour traffic, people walking along the street
clouds moving normally, sunrise or sunset
slow moving clouds, sunrise, sunset, waves on the beach
path of the sun on a clear day, moving shadows, night landscapes, stars and the moon
moving plants and trees, construction site over a day
